events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer role.
The candidate’s profile was reviewed and categorised under the engineering cluster based on the software developer skills listed.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles was assigned to manage the candidate’s progress for the engineering position.
The recruiter conducted a detailed initial screening call to assess the candidate’s experience in software development and technical background.
The candidate responded positively to the screening questions and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview was scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to evaluate coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong proficiency in software engineering concepts.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The candidate completed the HR interview with positive feedback on team fit and salary alignment.
We have extended a formal offer to the candidate for the software engineering position, outlining compensation and benefits.
The candidate gave positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed the joining date for the software engineering role.
Onboarding process began with documentation and introduction sessions for the new software engineer.
The recruitment case for the software engineer position was successfully closed following the complete onboarding.
